title: Posting on the Holy Shroud Guild Facebook Page
post:
Not for nutten I didn’t sign a model release for your use. LOL
As far as the context, It’s covers Gilles-Eric Séralini’s 2012 peer reviewed manuscript, “Long term toxicity of a Roundup herbicide and a Roundup-tolerant genetically modified maize”. and Rogers’ manuscript “Thermochimica Acta”.
A simple read with five or six questions on each topic.
author: Giorgio HSG

title: Posting on the Holy Shroud Guild Facebook Page
